documentation.text:
@dev This function locks the Original NFT
 and tell whirlExtension Contract to mint a new similar NFT

@dev This function unlocks the Original NFT to the 
 owner of the burnt similar NFT on whirlExtension

bridge(uint256,uint256,address).details: This function locks the Original NFT and tell whirlExtension Contract to mint a new similar NFT

execute(uint256,bytes,bytes32).details: This function unlocks the Original NFT to the  owner of the burnt similar NFT on whirlExtension
